verses.verse: <S%H8085>"Listen<s%> to <S%H7291>me,<s%> you who follow after <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> you who <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H5027>look<s%> to the <S%H6697>rock<s%> you were <S%H2672>cut<s%> <S%H4718>from,<s%> and to the hold of the <S%H953>pit<s%> you were dug <S%H5365>from.<s%>

<S%H5027>Look<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham<s%> your <S%H1>father,<s%> and to <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> who <S%H2342>bore<s%> <S%H259>you;<s%> for when he was but one I <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1288>him,<s%> and I blessed <S%H7235>him,<s%> and made him many.

For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H5162>comforted<s%> <S%H6726>Zion;<s%> he has <S%H5162>comforted<s%> all her waste <S%H2723>places,<s%> and has <S%H7760>made<s%> her <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> like <S%H5731>Eden,<s%> and her <S%H6160>desert<s%> like the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> <S%H8342>joy<s%> and <S%H8057>gladness<s%> shall be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H8426>therein,<s%> thanksgiving, and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H2172>melody.<s%>

<S%H7181>"Attend<s%> to <S%H5971>me,<s%> my people; and give <S%H238>ear<s%> to <S%H3816>me,<s%> my nation: for a <S%H8451>law<s%> shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> from <S%H7280>me,<s%> and I will establish my <S%H4941>justice<s%> for a <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples.<s%>

My <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> is <S%H7138>near,<s%> my <S%H3468>salvation<s%> is gone <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and my <S%H2220>arms<s%> shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples;<s%> the <S%H339>islands<s%> shall <S%H6960>wait<s%> for <S%H2220>me,<s%> and on my arm shall they <S%H3176>trust.<s%>

Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and <S%H5027>look<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8064>beneath;<s%> for the heavens shall vanish <S%H4414>away<s%> like <S%H6227>smoke,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall wax <S%H1086>old<s%> like a <S%H899>garment;<s%> and those who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H3644>same<s%> <S%H3654>way:<s%> but my <S%H3444>salvation<s%> shall be <S%H5769>forever,<s%> and my <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> shall not be <S%H2865>abolished.<s%>

<S%H8085>"Listen<s%> to <S%H3045>me,<s%> you who know <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> in whose <S%H3820>heart<s%> is my <S%H8451>law;<s%> <S%H3372>don't<s%> fear the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of <S%H582>men,<s%> neither be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> at their <S%H1421>insults.<s%>

For the <S%H6211>moth<s%> shall eat them <S%H398>up<s%> like a <S%H899>garment,<s%> and the <S%H5580>worm<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> them like <S%H6785>wool;<s%> but my <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> shall be <S%H5769>forever,<s%> and my <S%H3444>salvation<s%> to all <S%H1755>generations.<s%>"

<S%H5782>Awake,<s%> <S%H5782>awake,<s%> put <S%H3847>on<s%> <S%H5797>strength,<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> <S%H5782>awake,<s%> as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old,<s%> the <S%H1755>generations<s%> of <S%H6924>ancient<s%> <S%H2672>times.<s%> Isn't it you who cut <S%H7294>Rahab<s%> in <S%H2490>pieces,<s%> who pierced the <S%H8577>monster?<s%>

<S%H2717>Isn't<s%> it you who dried up the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H8415>deep;<s%> who <S%H7760>made<s%> the <S%H4615>depths<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> a <S%H1870>way<s%> for the <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> to pass <S%H5674>over?<s%>

The <S%H6299>ransomed<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall <S%H7725>return,<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> with <S%H7440>singing<s%> to <S%H6726>Zion;<s%> and <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H8057>joy<s%> shall be on their <S%H7218>heads.<s%> They shall <S%H5381>obtain<s%> <S%H8342>gladness<s%> and <S%H8057>joy.<s%> <S%H3015>Sorrow<s%> and <S%H585>sighing<s%> shall flee <S%H5127>away.<s%>

<S%H5162>"I,<s%> even I, am he who comforts <S%H3372>you:<s%> who are you, that you are afraid of <S%H582>man<s%> who shall <S%H4191>die,<s%> and of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> who shall be <S%H5414>made<s%> as <S%H2682>grass;<s%>

and have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H6213>Maker,<s%> who stretched <S%H5186>forth<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and laid the <S%H3245>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and <S%H6342>fear<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H2534>fury<s%> of the <S%H6693>oppressor,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> he makes <S%H3559>ready<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy?<s%> and where is the <S%H2534>fury<s%> of the <S%H6693>oppressor?<s%>

The captive <S%H6808>exile<s%> shall <S%H4116>speedily<s%> be <S%H6605>freed;<s%> and he shall not <S%H4191>die<s%> and go down into the <S%H7845>pit,<s%> neither shall his <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H2637>fail.<s%>

For I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> who <S%H7280>stirs<s%> up the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> so that its <S%H1530>waves<s%> <S%H1993>roar:<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> is his <S%H8034>name.<s%>

I have <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> in your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and have <S%H3680>covered<s%> you in the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> that I may <S%H5193>plant<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and lay the <S%H3245>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> <S%H5971><s%> 'You are my people.'"

<S%H5782>Awake,<s%> <S%H5782>awake,<s%> stand <S%H6965>up,<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> that have <S%H8354>drunk<s%> at the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> the <S%H3563>cup<s%> of his <S%H2534>wrath;<s%> you have <S%H8354>drunken<s%> the <S%H6907>bowl<s%> of the <S%H3563>cup<s%> of <S%H8653>staggering,<s%> and drained <S%H4680>it.<s%>

There is none to <S%H5095>guide<s%> her among all the <S%H1121>sons<s%> whom she has brought <S%H3205>forth;<s%> neither is there any who <S%H2388>takes<s%> her by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> among all the <S%H1121>sons<s%> who she has brought <S%H1431>up.<s%>

These <S%H8147>two<s%> things have <S%H7122>happened<s%> to <S%H5110>you.<s%> Who will bemoan <S%H7701>you?<s%> Desolation and <S%H7667>destruction,<s%> and the <S%H7458>famine<s%> and the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> how shall I comfort <S%H5162>you?<s%>

Your <S%H1121>sons<s%> have <S%H5968>fainted,<s%> they <S%H7901>lie<s%> at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of all the <S%H2351>streets,<s%> as an <S%H8377>antelope<s%> in a <S%H4364>net;<s%> they are <S%H4392>full<s%> of the <S%H2534>wrath<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H1606>rebuke<s%> of your <S%H430>God.<s%>
Therefore <S%H8085>hear<s%> now <S%H6041>this,<s%> you afflicted, and <S%H7937>drunken,<s%> but not with <S%H3196>wine:<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> your <S%H113>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and your <S%H430>God<s%> who <S%H7378>pleads<s%> the cause of his <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3947>"Behold,<s%> I have taken out of your <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H3563>cup<s%> of <S%H8653>staggering,<s%> even the <S%H6907>bowl<s%> of the <S%H3563>cup<s%> of my <S%H2534>wrath;<s%> you shall no <S%H3254>more<s%> drink it <S%H8354>again:<s%>

and I will <S%H7760>put<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of those who <S%H3013>afflict<s%> <S%H559>you,<s%> who have said to your <S%H5315>soul,<s%> <S%H7812><s%> 'Bow down, that we may walk <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H7760>you;<s%>' and you have laid your <S%H1460>back<s%> as the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and as the <S%H2351>street,<s%> to those who walk <S%H5674>over.<s%>"
